user.title: Diagral
user.description:
To set up your Diagral alarm system, you need a DIAG56AAX module which connects your alarm to the internet for remote control.
To find your Serial ID, check the label on your module or visit our setup guide: https://docs.page/mguyard/hass-diagral/integration/setup#how-to-find-your-system-serial-id
![SerialID Location](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mguyard/pydiagral/main/docs/how-to-find-diagral-serial.png)

account.title: Diagral Account
account.description:
Please provide your Diagral credentials
_Note: Make sure this account is associated with your Diagral alarm system and has sufficient permissions to interact with the alarm._
